definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Chinese Football Association Cup/soccer association cup
lit. a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood (idiom); fig. an utterly inadequate measure
to win a championship/to come out top/to take the cup
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)

sentences.english: Look at these coasters over here.
Mountain half marathon in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 山一半在杯的马拉松隆起，不列颠哥伦比亚，加拿大。

sentences.english: Can I get you your drink while you are making your selection?
sentences.chinese: 在您点餐的时候，我可以帮你拿杯饮料吗？

sentences.english: The Freedom Cup is a competition between New Zealand and South Africa during the Tri-Nations.
sentences.chinese: 自由杯是在三国赛期间新西兰和南非竞争的一个杯赛。

sentences.english: The fish tastes good, Why not have a cup of milk?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼味道不错。为什么不来杯牛奶？

sentences.english: On any given day, they might taste-test 150 cups.
sentences.chinese: 每天，他们或许都品测150杯咖啡。

sentences.english: You are my merbromin, he just a black coffee.
sentences.chinese: 妳是我的红药水，他只是杯黑咖啡。

sentences.english: Tea and coffee leave stains on cups and in pots.
sentences.chinese: 茶和咖啡会在杯和壶内留下污渍。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: What have you gained from the China Cup 2011?
sentences.chinese: 你通过参加本届中国杯收获了什么？

sentences.english: United have been drawn at home to Wolverhampton Wanderers in the third round of the Carling Cup.
sentences.chinese: 曼联在联赛杯第三轮的比赛里抽中了狼队。

sentences.english: Add water as needed, but not more than 1 cup.
sentences.chinese: 根据需要可以添多水，但是量不要超过1杯。

sentences.english: Sniffed it with pleasure then clinked his glass to hers.
sentences.chinese: 先高兴的闻了闻，再举起杯和玛丽莎碰了碰。

sentences.english: "Vino Nobile" is the starter series into the world of beverage-specific glasses.
sentences.chinese: “诺柏酒杯”开创了世界上饮料特效杯的新纪元。

sentences.english: Pour ingredients into a highball blass over ice. Stir, garnish and serve.
sentences.chinese: 将所有原料入盛有冰块的海波杯，搅合，装饰。

definition: invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to win a championship/to come out top/to take the cup
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
to raise glasses together/to toast one another
